mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_category = #{noticeCategory}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_pin = #{noticePin}, update_date = NOW() WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo} AND admin_no = #{adminNo}
mapper.insert:

mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no, a.admin_no, n.notice_category, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_pin, n.create_date, n.update_date, a.admin_name FROM notice n LEFT JOIN admin a ON n.admin_no = a.admin_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{noticeNo}
